alert.note: Alert for Linn (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 6:15PM CST until January 28 at 3:37AM CST by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kansas... Marais Des Cygnes River at La Cygne affecting Linn KS County. For the Marais Des Cygnes River...including La Cygne...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Marais Des Cygnes River at La Cygne. * WHEN...Until early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Low lying farmland and other rural land floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:15 PM CST Friday the stage was 24.4 feet. - Bankfull stage is 25.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 25.6 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Obs Forecasts Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sat Sat 12am 6am 12pm Marais Des Cygnes River La Cygne 25.0 24.4 Fri 5pm 25.6 24.6 22.5 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/kc/.
